objects.description: BRONZE BUTLER has used a tool called RarStar that encodes data with a custom XOR algorithm when posting it to a C2 server.

external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2017, October 12). BRONZE BUTLER Targets Japanese Enterprises. Retrieved January 4, 2018.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|G0060}} has used a tool called RarStar that encodes data with a custom XOR algorithm when posting it to a C2 server.
